sp_widget.template:
Welcome!

The Employee Management Portal tracks employees' and potential hires' skill sets. Users can rate their experience for approved assets. Users can also suggest assets that should be added. Admins can send potential hires emails with links containing time-sensitive tokens to allow form submission. Admins can approve suggested assets. Admins will also be able to assign a score to any user's asset.

The Employee Management Portal needs a few things to be useful.

  1. An Admin. User Administration > Groups > EMP Admins > Group Members > Edit > add user(s) to be admin.
    Add yourself if you plan to develop and test.
  2. Click on Admin Tools at the top of the page.
    There is a user creation widget on the right. Type can either be Employee or Potential Hire. When creating, if the type is set to Employee, the user will be automatically be associated with the EMP Employee Group. If the type is set to Potential Hire, an email will be sent to the email inputted with a newly created token.
  3. Asset Categories. Employee Management > Administration > Asset Categories.
    These are the main categories of assets. Make a few of these before continuing. Examples would be client side, server side, certifications, computer languages, etc.
  4. Personnel Assets. Employee Management > Personnel Assets.
    Add a few of these. They need a name and an asset category from the ones you made in previous step. An example would be Name: Javascript, Category: Client Side. Personnel Asset Instances are automatically created for all EMP Users when a new Personnel Asset is made. An email is sent out to all EMP Users when a new asset is added.
